website_summaries.verdict: The Lexmark Platinum Pro 905 is a fully capable all-in-one business device, but its touch screen might throw a wrench in your workflow. The Smart Solutions widgets add virtual customization to the control panel, but we wish Lexmark had retained a few hard buttons as well. As the top dog in the Lexmark printer family, the Platinum Pro 905 does the job, but the HP Officejet Pro 8500 Wireless does it better.

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well for printing. Scanning was a challenge ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for printing. Scanning was a challenge, it frequently took a couple attempts to get it to send to the computer. In the middle of printing, the color suddenly stopped coming out at all. The cartridge was near full, and hadn't been in the printer for long. Printing things in color would cause the meters on the screen to decline, but nothing actually came out. Tried another new cartridge to make sure it wasn't something that went wrong with the cartridge, the brand new one worked the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W Blumreich III

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this one
customer_reviews.text: Bought about 1 year ago on Amazon. The print head bands on color prints and can be solved by time (and ink) consuming deep jet cleaning. This lasts for about 30 pages and then recurs. So I bought a whole new print head and new ink. Same problem. Scanner is SLOW. Plastic cover for the scanner is cheap and toggles Cute web based diagnostics and trouble shooting are worthless Never again. Wasted the purchase price, the extra print head, the extra ink.
customer_reviews.author: busyguy

customer_reviews.title: best for all uses, including photos....
customer_reviews.text: this is the second Lexmark platinum printer I have purchased. aside from have a difficult time connecting the the wifi, I love this machine and am looking to purchase the laser color in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: REGISTER it!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you register this product within the 90 days, so that you have recourse! This item WILL have problems. The top panel becomes disengaged and won't feed properly after a while, so scanning docs get to be a real pain.....so had to jury rig mine with a big c-clamp in order to make it work properly. Bottom line, register to take advantage of the 5 year warranty.....it's too easy to forget about it with the newness and all. Overall a decent printer, and the ink is inexpensive by most standards.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl F.

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, Lexmark support is terrific
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Pinnace Pro 905. No, not a replacement, one for home, one for (non-home) office. It's a terrific printer - when it works. It's a fast printer, and if you print a lot of black-only - it hard to beat on the cost of ink per page. I've been happy with the color printing, but the cost is competitive, not amazing. The quality is very good. Parts break, though, and Lexmark is speedy about sending replacement parts at no cost to the user. This happened 2ce on my 3 year old Pro905, we'll see about this new one.....
customer_reviews.author: lesliegl

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark 905
customer_reviews.text: It is early to tell, but I really like this printer, so far. The wireless feature is an important feature, being able to print something from my laptop from the other room. I have not printed any pictures so far, but the resolution is clear on work pages that I have printed. I also like the two tray design, where I can potentially have legal paper in one tray, and regular size in the other. The menu on the printer seems to be very easy to follow. I will write more, when I have had it longer. Also the inexpensive ink cartridges are a plus, too. (Four black cartridges on Amazon for $28 bucks, incl. shipping!)
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: I've owned many brands and this is the best by far!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this same exact printer for two years and it is by far the best in ink usage, ink price, and features. It has worked flawlessly for all this time and the warranty (5 years)which is longer then most other printers I've own. I would highly recommend it. Make sure you get the latest software and firmware updates.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful all in one printer
customer_reviews.text: As for this print is really great. It sure does save you alot of money because the black ink for it is only $5.00 dollar. And the saves from have to use your colors. This printer and fax really does what it says it well. The printed stuff looks like it is real. The 900 serials is great.
customer_reviews.author: fran woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Scanning is Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device to replace my old Lexmark that didn't scan anymore. When I tried to scan with this one it jammed immediately. Also, you can't save the scan settings. You have to change them every time!!! This sucker is going back. P.S. Tiger Direct's customer "service" is non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for all in one.
customer_reviews.text: Needed for home office. Set up was easy. Took about 45 min to un box and completely set up. Wireless feature and scan to email work great. Print quality more than adequate for my needs, but note I have not and likely will not use for finished photos. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Providence

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer and Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This printer was very easy to set up on my wireless network. In my opinion it is the best all in one printer on the market in its price range. Another plus is that the black ink is only $4.99. If you buy ink through the Lexmark rewards program you can get a free ink cartridge for every 5 that you purchase and you can also get a free ink cartridge for every 5 that you send back to Lexmark in the Postage paid envelopes provided by Lexmark. When you order inks from the Lexmark rewards program there is no shipping cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great printer with many features
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the Lexmark Platinum Pro905 for 2 years. It is the best printer I have ever owned. Set up was a breeze. The black ink is super cheap. It has been very dependable and I do a LOT of printing (grad student). I love the duplex feature and the extra paper tray. I am baffled by all the complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shibaowner

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent printer that offers all needed functions, renders my copier, fax machine and scanner obsolete. Have set up wireless access, so can print from laptop as well as desktop hard wired system. Excellent copies including photos, and overall very satisfied with this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Sam W. Cullison

customer_reviews.title: Printer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this printer for about two months and it works great. Best of all, I can print from anywhere in the house without a problem. The replacement ink cartridge is inexpensive, $4 to $5, unlike the replacement ink cartridge of other printers.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth Man

customer_reviews.title: Echo piece of junk sentiments
customer_reviews.text: Lid breaks easily (many people have same issue), constant problems with wireless connection, drivers sometimes are hard to download from Lexmark site, if they even will appear, paper jams pretty easily, scanner not the best, ... You get the picture. POS. Don't buy it. I am somewhat tech savvy and have wasted so much time with this pile of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Enzyme

customer_reviews.title: good one but had to contact customer service no less than 3 times
customer_reviews.text: the first problem with printhead was solved when them sent it immediately after I bought it. It is crazy sometimes but overall is a good and economic one
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: This all in one printer is absolutely amazing you wont regret your purchase. It's handy and makes your office life so much easier
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The printer had the same problem as my existing Lexmark Pro905...broken ADF hinge.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM BURRELL

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually do these reviews but I really like this printer. It came in just a few days even though it was supposed to take more than a week with regular shipping. This is my second Lexmark printer and I've been very happy with both. It prints quickly, photos are excellent, scans very well and I love the single button functions. I have a small business and this is perfect for me. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Rod R

customer_reviews.title: Platinum Pro905
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to set up and easy to use. It is user friendly. It allows you to scan, copy, and email from its touch screen as well as from the computer. Setup for all the functions including setup up for network printing is easy. It is excellent wireless all in one machine. I love it. E. Bak
customer_reviews.author: E. Bak

customer_reviews.title: bad vendor
customer_reviews.text: i buy the printer, it arrived and not in original mfg box, no cable, no electrical cord, no cd drivers. i buy the same model due to i have over 60 carts for my business, so i put on with my cord and cable, test run it and found out the printer can not align itself, so i packed it up in new box taped sent by fedex with sign return form cost me 115.00 for shipping, and vendor said that i damaged it, and give me partial refund. i complainted to amazon rep. and they gave me back the different, but this vendor is bad.
customer_reviews.author: van

customer_reviews.title: This printer is a total diva
customer_reviews.text: This printer cannot print more than 6 pages without jamming. The print head keeps gumming up. Wireless works well enough. what a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Grant McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This printer replaced a Lexmark wireless that we bought about 18 months ago. This one was more expensive but worth every penny. It was relatively easy to set up. In addition to our desk top pc I have a macbook. I did have to get assistance from customers service to get the macbook to print but that didn't take long. I could not be more pleased this this Lexmark model.
customer_reviews.author: R. Coward

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product until something breaks
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product until something breaks! Fax lid connection broke and is now unusable. No one local to repair and the repair would not be worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: B. Breding

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the first one but PC Nation took care of it and now I have a new one that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Deramax

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Constantly have to clean the printhead to maintain decent print quality. Every time you clean the printhead it wastes ink. No cost savings, just frustration. Probably going to grab a hammer and give it the "Office Space" treatment. Going back to HP.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: This is now our THIRD of these printers in the family. We use them for everything from school to photo and work project printing without even the slightest issue. The ink cost is AMAZINGLY low! After years of going through garbage printers every 6 months, these are top notch and since buying the first one three years ago, no others are even in the same ballpark.
customer_reviews.author: Lexander

customer_reviews.title: LEXMARK PLATINUM PRO905
customer_reviews.text: I'M NOT VERY GOOD AT WRITTING PRODUCT REVIEWS.L ALL I CAN SAY ABOUTH THIS LEXMARK PLATINUM PRO905 IS THAT IT IS AN OUTSTANDING PIECE OF EQUIPMENT. I'VE HAD OTHER PRINTERS BY LEADING MANUFATURES BUT THEY CAN'T COKMPARE TO THIS UNIT. PLUS THE COST OF BUYING REPACEMENT INK CARTRIDGESISVERY ECONOMICAL COMPARED TO OTHER MFR'S INK CARTRIDGES COST. JLWSGT.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES  L.  WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Very good office class machine
customer_reviews.text: I have two and would buy this 4 in 1 again. Economical ink and very good quality print. Once in awhile, the printer seems to have a mind of its own and doesn't respond to one of my laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bailey

customer_reviews.title: printhead failure after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it worked great. Easy to setup and get on the network. After 1 year the printhead failed. Lexmark is sending a replacement after 1/2 hour on the phone. I'd suggest avoiding this printer.
customer_reviews.author: ToddG

customer_reviews.title: Fax and Scan work fine. Tried several suggestions by the Lexmark help desk ...
customer_reviews.text: Constant problems with printing from desktop computer. Fax and Scan work fine. Tried several suggestions by the Lexmark help desk but still unable to solve problem. Would not buy a Lexmark product again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Landino

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark Platinum Pro905 Printer
customer_reviews.text: Printer works great and does everything it said it would. Setup was much easier than other printers (i.e. HP). Low price was nice. Have not had to install new ink cartridges yet, but I was able to find them online for a good price. So far very happy and would buy Lexmark again.
customer_reviews.author: BRADLEY WILLCOX

customer_reviews.title: Best  for yor money and environment
customer_reviews.text: This printer have everything that I was looking for. The cartrige of black ink is very afordable and you can save paper (trees) using the duplex option. Also have 5 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Juan

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark pro905 printer
customer_reviews.text: Great printer setup was very easy ,have had it for a month with everything working great.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: made it to a month past the warranty period. typical
customer_reviews.author: iben thrashin

customer_reviews.title: change my mind
customer_reviews.text: I changed my mind because it's hard to configure to connect it wirelessly. Therefore, I purchased another different and east to use printer..
customer_reviews.author: Samir Agayev

customer_reviews.title: The death of the HP printer...
customer_reviews.text: Drivers work. Printer works, prints, scans, copies better than my Officejet 8500 all in one. Ink costs $4.81 cents per cartridge. Cheaper than you can refill old ones. Enough said. :)
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Happy with adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Broken lid to scanner made sheet feed unuseable. It was of no value to me. But seller made a prompt adjustment which satisfied me completely.
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Printer
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well these printers work you can print five cent copies anywhere I love the fact that I can print these for a penny a piece inkiest cheap they always have an Office Depot I love
customer_reviews.author: raymond schramm

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark Rules
customer_reviews.text: Incredible quality reliability and black ink for $5....what's not to love? I have purchased and continue to use 4 of these printers and not regretted doing so once!
customer_reviews.author: KRS2

customer_reviews.title: LEXMARK ALL IN ONE
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Wifi device and it was pretty eaasy to set up. I love the fact that the B/W cartriges are only about $5.00 a piece.
customer_reviews.author: George Adamopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Good value and and good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Researched quite a few "all in one" and from reviews,e tc., this one seem to meet my expectations, cost, quality wise, etc. Easy to assemble. Good quality printing; have not tried fax yet but seem to be well build printer; that ink costs less add to the overall value to the product. Would highly recommend; remember, not too many printers come with a five year warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer because it was a good price and had all the features that I wanted...networked, color and black and white, double sided printing, large paper tray, scanner, etc. I've been using it for about 3 weeks and I am very happy with it. Super easy to set up, works reliably, and it looks good. Best home/work printer I've had in years.
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: very good..
customer_reviews.text: i'm very pleased with this printer. easy installation and wireless works great. print is clear and scanning to laptop works great.
customer_reviews.author: jlynn

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than any HP printer
customer_reviews.text: Much better than any HP printer that I have owned. The ink lasts a very long time the print heads don't plug, Drivers work great. After owning many HP all in one printers for 15 years this is great! A printer that really works and does not cost a fortune to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Fobaire

customer_reviews.title: love my printer
customer_reviews.text: i love my printer its easy to use and i havent counted how many pages it prints but alot more than my other and ink is cheep
customer_reviews.author: Linda Felger

customer_reviews.title: The worst product ever
customer_reviews.text: The styling and presentation are what sold me on this. It did not function properly from the first day. After 1.5 hours on the phone with tech support from a foreign land, they conceded the machine was defective. The new machine did arrive promptly as promised, but none of the functions worked, it is a multi-malfunction machine. AFter another 2 hours on the phone with tech support, they promised to send another new machine. this time after waiting a week, instead of a new machine i recieved a print cartridge. i just carried the machine out to the dumpster. i will never buy another lexmark.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Lexmark Platinum Pro905 Business Class Wireless Multifunction Inkjet Printer
customer_reviews.text: love it and using it regularly very nicely printer, it was shipped on time . and well packed. printer is in use of all family. easy to work with it.
customer_reviews.author: mohammed shafiq

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Once set up this printer does an excellent job with all office tasks. Cons- Directions for set up need to be clearer, as it is a little more difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bryant

customer_reviews.title: pro 905 printer
customer_reviews.text: this is an exellent printer easy to set up. it arrived quickly. and appears so far to be cost effective. the last lexmark lasted 8 years. i expect this one to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Have no Idea how it works as I have not got it yet just upset that every time I go to the web sight to see it or show it to some one the price is cheaper than I paid for it they change the price every day. I paid 222.00 the next day it was for 200.00 and today it is 219.00 all in three days
customer_reviews.author: Disapointed Customer

product_meta.title: Lexmark Platinum Pro905 Business Class Wireless Multifunction Inkjet Printer with Web-Enabled Touchscreen
feature_bullets: Lowest priced multi-function printer offering one cent printing for low-cost black-and-white pages.

The 4.3" myTouch LCD Touchscreen with SmartSolutions Technology allows customers to connect to the Web and quickly automate repetitive tasks. These time-saving, customizable productivity features are ideal for small businesses or home offices.

Wireless printing—802.11n wireless network and Ethernet compatibility offer the fastest speeds and longest range and give customers the freedom to print from virtually anywhere within the office and the flexibility to print from multiple computers.
Extra 150-page tray to reduce intervention or manage multiple media types.
The 50-page automatic document feeder and the 300-page capacity allow the Pro905 to easily handle large printing, scanning, copying and faxing jobs
